title: Ayurvedic Sleep Supplement (Melatonin-free Herbal Formula)
excerpt: A melatonin-free herbal sleep aid using jatamansi, brahmi, and ashwagandha for natural relaxation and improved sleep onset.
content:
## What Is This Sleep Supplement?
A gentle, melatonin-free herbal capsule crafted with jatamansi, brahmi, and ashwagandha. Supports sleep latency, calmness, and deep relaxation.

## Ayurvedic Significance
True sleep support means pacifying Vata and grounding the mind. These herbs stabilize the nervous system without synthetic hormones.

### Key Benefits
- Helps sleep onset and relaxation.
- Melatonin-free & non-habit-forming.
- Supports natural circadian regulation.

## Ingredients
- Jatamansi
- Brahmi
- Ashwagandha

## Usage Instructions
- Take one capsule 30–60 minutes before sleep or as per label.

## Packaging
- Bottle with guidance and complementary lifestyle tips.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult if pregnant, on sedatives, or treating chronic insomnia.

## Why Choose This Supplement?
A natural herbal sleep ally that works with your body's rhythms—not against them.
